channel.title: How do i post my server?
channel.description: hey ima trying to make an rs server and a friend offered to help well i would love his help but i cant realy get his help over the phone now so i was planning to post it cuz i now how to place everything and he is more creative then me lol but the problem is that i have no idea how to post it online or add it to a site or anything like that can someone help me out here??

item.title: How do i post my server?

item.description:
@emo_skill wrote:

Oh okay yeah with Teamviewer he can view and control your computer screen.

item.title: How do i post my server?
item.dc:creator: @emo_skill emo skill
item.description:
@emo_skill wrote:

[quote=“watcomes, post:5, topic:352343”]ok lme refraze… i want my server to be online so he can log on with me WITHOUT sending him ANYTHING or having him download ANYTHING i want to register my server as if its good enough to release

am i making sense now?[/quote]

Sounds like you want a webclient?

item.title: How do i post my server?
item.dc:creator: @emo_skill emo skill
item.description:
@emo_skill wrote:

1.Get winrar if you don’t have it from cnet or rarlab.com
2.right click your source file and press Add Archive…
3.then make it a .rar file
4.upload it to mediafire.com
5.give him share link
6.BAM.

Read full topic
